text: was a Japanese politician. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party. He was in the House of Representatives from 2003 to 2021. Teruya is part of the All-Okinawa coalition. Teruya was born in Saipan, Northern Mariana Islands. He was a member of the House of Councillors between 1995 and 2001. Teruya died on April 15, 2022 in Nishihara, Japan from stomach cancer, aged 76.前衆院議員の照屋寛徳さん死去 76歳、衆参合わせ国会議員24年 ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Okinawa Prefecture
title: Kantoku Teruya
